en.title: {{Senior Full-Stack}} Engineer
en.text: Designed and scaled multi-tenant SaaS platforms using React.js (Next.js) and Node.js/Express, serving 1.2M+ active users with 99.95% uptime on AWS. Engineered server-side rendered React applications, cutting load times from 3.2s to 1.7s and improving SEO visibility by 48%.
list: Deployed containerized microservices via Docker, Kubernetes, and GitHub Actions, reducing release cycles by 65%
Implemented secure API gateways and optimized MongoDB pipelines, boosting throughput by 38% and reducing latency by 42%
Enhanced AI-driven automation modules with Python/Django + React.js, lowering support workload by 35% and saving 1,400+ hours annually
Built internal monitoring services with Go + React, enabling unified telemetry dashboards and 25% faster incident resolution
Introduced real-time event streaming using WebSockets and RabbitMQ, cutting data propagation delays by 40% for 500K+ concurrent users
Mentored eight engineers and standardized CI/CD templates, improving delivery velocity by 28%

en.title: {{Senior Full-Stack}} Developer
en.text: Directed full-stack development for logistics platforms using React.js and Node.js, maintaining 99.9% uptime and scaling to 250K+ users. Developed high-performance REST/GraphQL APIs in Node.js with MongoDB, improving query performance by 45%.
list: Distributed modular dashboards using Next.js, reducing feature rollout cycles by 35%
Engineered backend analytics modules with Ruby on Rails + React.js, cutting report generation time by 50%
Migrated legacy Angular.js apps into React.js SPAs, increasing frontend performance by 33%
Implemented CI/CD pipelines with Docker, Jenkins, and AWS, decreasing integration time by 60%
Created authentication framework reducing API latency by 27% and improving request consistency

en.title: {{Software}} Engineer
en.text: Expanded and deployed scalable Node.js/Express microservices on IBM Cloud (Bluemix), increasing system scalability by 30% and enhancing the overall reliability of enterprise SaaS operations. Integrated Watson AI APIs for NLP automation, reducing manual processing by 30% and improving accuracy by 25%.
list: Improved internal enterprise tools using Java/Spring Boot + React.js, improving API performance by 40%
Optimized MongoDB clusters with sharding and caching, improving query response time by 43%
Automated Docker-based pipelines in Jenkins, increasing deployment reliability by 33%
Redesigned API middleware layers to unify authentication and schema validation across hybrid stacks, reducing authorization errors by 40%
Delivered internal DevOps utilities in Go, reducing system monitoring overhead by 20%

en.title: {{Full-Stack Software}} Engineer
en.text: Developed enterprise dental management systems using ASP.NET + Angular, improving workflow efficiency by 27%. Programmed RESTful APIs in .NET with SQL Server, increasing data reliability by 35% and improving sync performance.
list: Refactored monolithic architecture into modular Node.js microservices, reducing release errors by 45%
Built billing automation with Java/Spring Boot, streamlining payment processing and reducing errors by 22%
Implemented Jenkins-driven automated testing pipelines, cutting post-release bugs by 32%
Enforced end-to-end HIPAA compliance frameworks with AES-256 encryption and RBAC policies, passing 100% of security audits
Modernized UI workflows, improving task completion time by 20% and satisfaction scores

en.title: {{Junior Web}} Developer
en.text: Developed LAMP-based eCommerce and real estate platforms using PHP (Laravel) and MySQL, achieving 99.8% uptime and 28% faster response times. Customized WordPress stores with automated inventory and payment integration, boosting client conversion rates by 22%.
list: Built responsive layouts using HTML, CSS, and jQuery, improving mobile usability by 30%
Delivered content-driven platforms using Python/Django + React.js, reducing load times by 33% and increasing engagement by 40%
